hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that showing the #Mask of Truth in the Deku Theater# rewards #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs #Know-It-All Brothers' House#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: Did you know that ReDead eat their defeated friends?

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path to #the Key#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Prescription#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that playing #Sun's Song# in a grave spawns #a Recovery Heart#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that the #Water Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that plundering #the Water Temple# is a foolish choice.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: KF Grass Near Ramp Green Rupee 2

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Goron City## has #3# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Wallet# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Green Rupee# and #the Pocket Egg#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #2# major items.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to the #Kokiri Emerald#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a room containing a #large pot in the Shadow Temple# holds...^ #a Deku Shield# and #the Eyedrops#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple GS Single Giant Pot

LW (Bridge).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Green Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Saria's House#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Green Rupee#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Piece of Heart#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple After Boat Lower Recovery Heart

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #the Prescription#.

ZF (Fairy).text: Did you know that Barinade, Volvagia and Twinrova hard require the Boomerang, Megaton Hammer and Mirror Shield, respectively?

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that ##Lake Hylia## has #2# major items.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Fire Temple#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path to #the Tower#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.
